message.body: I only had one. The beer I got yesterday was to bring to a party. I did stash one in my fridge just in case I really liked it
Didn't you go with the HopBack though?
I did. The troegenator is something I would get for myself. There was talk about a dreamweaver or something?
You didn't mention Dreamweaver
I'm kind of undecided on Dreamweaver. It's pretty decent, but a little weird.
Sorry, last night at the party.
Sometimes I like it and sometimes I don't.
Ah.
Like most things...
haha
no
=P
Ugh. I'd much rather be drinking right now than this tile job :-/
I would hate to be working this late
I love my regularly scheduled corporate job, haha.
Can't stand variable scheduling
I need to get it done so I can grout in the morning
yeah
I like being able to do whatever the fuck I want when I want, bit 9-5? Is nice too =|
You know, for all that I'm a beer snob, and in general fairly elitist, I can't stand movie elitists
Like, srsly, did you enjoy watching it for any reason whatsoever? Then who the fuck cares.
Movies and TV are pure consumption.
Regardless of assigned "quality"
I disagree. I mean a pure movie elitist yes, but you wont catch me watching an episode of 'friends' anytime soon. BTW, salmon fishing in Yemen was pretty good
I mean, if you don't like it, that's fine.
But why bother discriminating on anything other than that?
A friend of mine was just bitching to me about his roommate watching Underworld Awakening or something.
He hasn't even seen the movie

He was just irked on some details (including leather bodysuits? wtf? hot women in leather bodysuits is now a reason not to like a movie?) that were immaterial to pretty much anything, and was convincing himself not to enjoy it just because of those details
At first it was just women pissing me off today, bit now its guys too
PMSing?
Damnit! I wish autocorrect would stop replacing but with bit
my autocorrect likes putting "eating" for "dating"
dislike.
No, see us men don't have menstrual cycles, therefore we don't suffer from the aforementioned syndrome
But you're not like most men, right? ;)
Maybe all those female friends have evoked atypical hormonal shifts.
Mentally no, physically I am
lol
I don't have breast or anything.
I'm aware.
I think I might go home and drink white Russians. Is that to feminine?
Enh
Drink what you want. I just said that because you keep pointing out that I'm more masculine and you're more feminine. =P
In some respects I think thats true, but only relative to the norms
mm
5 tiles left
Trying to decide if I should just go to bed or try writing more =(
so tired
Done
nice
Yeah I'm pretty beat, but I know I wont be able to sleep
that won't be a problem for me lol
I just hope I don't wake up at 5:30 again
fuck what?
Oh, that was from yesterday.
My final project was frustrating me to the point that I was starting to cry, haha
So I said fuck it and wrote something else instead
ah
so are classes done yet?
Technically done last Thursday
yeah thats what I though. you may have mentioned that before
Ugh, I can't tell if I'm hungry or my stomach is just being a pain in the ass
I'll tell ya whats a pain in the ass: grouting
More like a pain in the back
oh, so you point out my error, but I let "stomach is being a pain in the ass" go
I wasn't pointing out an error, I was trying to indicate that I empathize because I know how taxing grouting can be
actually it didnt hurt my back, it's just teadious
Liz: That's what I meant 9:55 PM You come across as a real ass sometimes.
huh, not sure why it did that twice. Per an earlier conversation
I'm not entirely sure why you're pasting
I'd rather you come right out and say it than pasting something and trying to lead me to the answer
I found it amusing
Ah
OH! so get this, the married woman I was 'seeing' a while back finally admitted to getting back together with her hubby
I didn't know you were dating a married woman
I guess she thought that ignoring me was the best way to handle that
Sure, why not
well she was separated
I don't get it
If you're afraid of hurting their feelings, then you should have been communicating more, not less
Because you clearly either weren't on the same page or didn't know which page the other was on
more the latter
If you're afraid of their reaction, you shouldn't have been in the relationship to begin with
All told, the silent treatment is either you being a coward, you being stupid, or you being selfish
well in all fairness, it wasnt really a relationship
I wouldn't fuck anyone I was scared to upset
either
I think it was a little of all three of those
yeah
I try not to be those things these days.
Because I'm an adult. =|
it just kinda pissed me off because I thought the whole point of this open relationship was to avoid those things
Half the time I thought she was going to end up getting back together with him anyway, which I would have been fine with
well, except for the lack of sex =|
Sex is overrated.
generally yes
It seems to lead to a lot more hassle than it's worth most of the time.
it was more than just sex though
and overall it was probably the most laid back relationship I've ever had, mainly due to the lack of pressure/expectation
